document.full_text: mexican authorities said sunday that they had found 16 more bodies buried in mass graves in the northeastern state of tamaulipas, raising the total to 88.
document.title: the americas: mexico: more bodies found near u.s.
lines_and_colors: mexican authorities said sunday that they had found 16 more bodies buried in mass graves in the northeastern state of tamaulipas, raising the total to 88.
